DOC.brief_summary: The Peripheral Arterial Disease prevalence is around 3-10 % of the world population. Exercise plays an important role in treating these patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Exercise in the Functional Capacity, Central Artery and Rigidity Ankle Brachial Index
